Title: Neurological update: gliomas and other primary brain tumours in adults
Abstract: © 2017, The Author(s).The emerging understanding of molecular changes in a wide range of brain tumours has led to a significant shift in how these tumours are diagnosed, managed and treated. This article will provide a hands-on overview of the relevant biomarkers and their association with newly defined biological tumour entities.
